description:
The Walking Dead‘s high body count means that the show’s cast often needs replenishing, and season 5 promises to introduce another character from Robert Kirkman’s comic book series: Father Gabriel Stokes, who will be played by The Wire actor Seth Gilliam.Robert Kirkman漫画改编美剧《行尸走肉》第五季Rick生存团队更新速度相当快，第五季才第二集就有新角色出现：Seth Gillian扮演的Gabriel Stokes神父。

Deadline reports that the season 5 cast isn’t quite done growing just yet, however, as American Horror Story actor Alexandra Breckenridge has been cast as “Samantha”. The character breakdown describes her as an “attractive, strong, smart, charming and articulate woman who also has a vulnerable side. She’s a mother with a bohemian spirit, and a talented artist.” Deadline网站报道，第五季还将会有新人出现，包括《美国恐怖故事》演员Alexandra Breckenridge扮演的Samantha。这是个有吸引力、强壮、从没、有魅力、口才又极好、已为人母的女画家，而她也有一个明显弱点。

Breckenridge had a recurring role in the first season of American Horror Story as the younger version of Moira, housekeeper to the ‘Murder House’, in a role that she shared with Francis Conroy. Breckenridge曾在《美国恐怖故事：鬼屋》中扮演年轻版的女仆Moira，她和Francis Conroy分演这个角色的年轻和年老扮相。

title: 《美恐》性感女仆加入《行尸走肉》
